Prices seem about on par with some of the sources cited in the following threads. Some of the US vendors seem to have pretty fast turnaround times. What was your lead time from China?

HTD Belt Stock Technical Discussion
I’m building a linear motion component, and need belts for 24t pulleys that have about 52.5" CC distance. For this application, I don’t need continuous belts. Does anyone know where I can find non-continuous HTD belt stock?
Source for rolls of 5mm HTD belt Technical Discussion
We would like to use 5mm HTD belt for an elevator, but we are having a hard time finding a source for a long roll or spool of belt. Any suggestions on where to buy it? Mcmaster Carr has spools of XL timing belt, does anyone have experience with this for elevator applications?
Online HTD belt source with fast shipping Technical
Looking for some odd size HTD belts. Does anyone know of a reliable supplier?

No have not found any. This probably is as if you don’t 3DP herring bone is very difficult to machine - talking about the pulleys. And I don’t see advantage for a herringbone belt off hand and keeping belts from sliding off well aligned pulleys usually is not a problem
